reviews.review_msg: An old-schooled professor. Mostly likes to read through the slides during classes, which makes a 400-level class dry. I personally didn't like this teaching style.

The course content wasn't what I was expecting, and unfortunately I found it really drybut it was bearable enough. He has a tendency to ramble in lectures and his slides are pointlessthe book is way better at explaining things. Really nice guy tho Also no idea how he arrived at grades he did. No tests and episodes of Yes Minister were pluses.
